name: Two Guy's one Coins
description:
This game was created as part of the Trijam 68.9 it was made in about 4 hours. The goal of the game is you with two characters, one on each side. Your goal is to have both characters in the room.
the Controls are: directional arrows for the white character.
[W,A,S,D] and [Z,Q,S,D] for the black character. To kill the enemies you must jump on their heads.

It was made under the Godot Engine.

For Mac you have to dezip and click on the executable.
